    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="hu">Népszónok</string>
            <string language="en">Popular Orator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Populärer Redner</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Orateur Populaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Orator Popular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orator Popolare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δημοφιλής ομιλητής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Orador popular</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Népszónok a dulaizmus korában</string>
            <string language="en">A popular orator in the age of dualism</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">választás,  kampány,  agitáció,  életmód,  viselet,  </string>
            <string language="en">election, campaign, canvassing, lifestlye, dress</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein populärer Redner im Alter von dualism</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un orateur populaire dans l'âge du dualisme</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um orator popular na idade do dualism</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un orator popolare nell'età del dualism</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας δημοφιλής ομιλητής στην ηλικία του δυϊσμού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un orador popular en la edad del dualism</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wahl, Kampagne, erörternd, lifestlye, Kleid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">élection, campagne, prospectant, lifestlye, robe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">eleição, campanha, canvassing, lifestlye, vestido</string>
          </keyword>

vestito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκλογή, εκστρατεία, που δοκιμάζει τη γνώμη, lifestlye, 
φόρεμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">elección, campaña, solicitando votos, lifestlye, 
alineada</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
